name: ROXY STUDIOS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Welcome to Prebuuk.com ! India’s dedicated Health Checkup Platform.

With a dedicated team & strong customer ethics, it feel happy that Prebuuk.com is the first choice to customers when it comes to an online checkup in India. Prebuuk.com has a pan India presence as we work as booking engine for health checkup needs to every state in the country. We take your health seriously at Prebuuk.com. Be it individual test, profile or packages booking lab tests, we’ve got it all covered for our customers!

Don’t Worry! Book Health Checkup Online Anytime, Anywhere!

Booking Health Checkup online at Prebuuk.com from the comfort of your home / office and we will take care of the rest! We will ensure that our customers get right package at best & affordable price at the click of button.

Booking Health Checkup online at Prebuuk.com is just a simple 2 step process. Browse through our wide range of Health Checkup online, fill up required details & book it.

Always worry about getting your lab tests done because it’s a hassle to to schedule them or because they are over expensive? Visit Prebuuk.com to book health checkup packages online from well-reputed, certified diagnostic labs according to your convenience and at affordable rates.

Pan India Services

Serving more than 100 cities & 2700 + pincodes.

Trust of more than 1 million+ loyal customers

Experienced Health consultant to guide customers for best & right test / packages.

Our Awards and Recognition

We at Prebuuk.com understands the pain of customers to book the right test for themselves. With today scenario post covid & firmly believe health is wealth, we are extremely proud to be at the forefront of the online health checkup industry. We are pleased to highlight some of our awards here and we aim to continue adding more feathers to our cap everytime.

We have bagged the “ Indian Start-Up of the Year’ at the Blindwink Awards 2019.

Customer satisfaction is our motto & will always abide by that.
name: PREBUUK INDIA PVT LTD

idea: Mati, our brand vision is to promote the value of meaningful clothing and creating a product that is ethical and modern. Our brand is 'Peta Approved Vegan' for using animal free raw materials. Fabrics sourced are 100% bio-degradable and hand-spun by local weavers of India.
name: FLAMBE FASHIONS

idea:
Pure Nutriment Farm Private Limited is incorporated on 27 September 2021 having its registered office at 2102-A,PLOT C 355, 2A/357, BLD A, WING B DOSTIAMBROSIA,SHAIKHMISREE RD, ANTOPHILL MUMBAI City MH 400037 IN.

It is involved in Manufacture and retain of food products including -quality production of Hatching Eggs, Chicks and Cobb-430 Broiler Chickens. Our main focus is to produce, Process and Packaging cleanest, healthy, safe and Pure chicken to the consumers. Our chicks are grown by our own farmers with best-in-class practices and use only Vegetarian /Herbal feed.

Our Processing Plant follow all the standard of animal welfare, Food Safety and HALAL procedures and ISO 22000 certified.
name: PURE NUTRIMENT FARM PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
ABOUT

‘Our superlative range of services are tailor-made to protect you from the roots to the pinnacle’ 

Techno Integrated Services Pvt Ltd is a futuristic and advanced company holistically dedicated to safeguarding and protecting commercial and residential premises, VIP’s, standalone events, taking subsequent measures against and detecting potential misdemeanors, and also conducting private investigations.

Our services include providing top notch and strict Security guards, bouncers and body guards all of whom are the best of the best.

We also provide well trained and groomed housekeeping staff, trained to suit all of your needs. Our services extend the broad likes of Housing Societies, Commercial & Industrial Complexes, Factories, Corporates, Schools, Hospitals and events to name a few along with Celebrities, Politicians and other important personnel.


WE OFFER

PRIVATE SECURITY SERVICES

HOUSEKEEPING

JOB VERIFICATETION SERVICES
name: TECHNO INTEGRATED SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
A game-changer in addressing the needs of rural schools, Ennoble Social Innovations focuses on transforming the government school landscape of India through scalable and sustainable innovations. Since its inception in 2018, Ennoble has been making an impact in 58 plus districts. Everything we do comes from our commitment towards delivering an engaging learning environment and promoting quality educational outcomes for rural school students.

Our innovative products and educational interventions have been recognized through several national and international awards including Top 24 Startup- Maharashtra State Innovation Award, Cemex-Tec Social Entrepreneurship Award- Mexico, Infosys Foundation – Aarohan Innovation Award. We are also incubated with Atal Innovation Mission – AIC-RMP and IIMB NSRCEL.
name: ENNOBLE SOCIAL INNOVATION FOUNDATION
